channel.title: typing on Jexetic
channel.description: Recent content in typing on Jexetic

item.title: 100 WPM
item.description: 100 WPM average for most recent races, 92 overall. Getting quicker! 100 WPM average on the recent races is with the MacBook keyboard… so I guess I like this keyboard. I already loved this laptop anyway but that’s a plus!
item.content:encoded: 100 WPM average for most recent races, 92 overall. Getting quicker! 100 WPM average on the recent races is with the MacBook keyboard… so I guess I like this keyboard. I already loved this laptop anyway but that’s a plus!

item.description: The 89 WPM race hurts my soul but I don’t have time to do 10 more races right now.
item.content:encoded: The 89 WPM race hurts my soul but I don’t have time to do 10 more races right now.

item.title: Speed Typing
item.description: I logged back into my TypeRacer account. So here are my typing speed stats as of today. Hopefully they’ll go up, top 1% or better here I come?
item.content:encoded: I logged back into my TypeRacer account. So here are my typing speed stats as of today. Hopefully they’ll go up, top 1% or better here I come?
